metadata.title: CVE-2018-17231 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** Telegram Desktop (aka tdesktop) 1.3.14 might allow attackersto cause a denial of service (assertion failure and application exit) viaan "Edit color palette" search that triggers an "index out of range"condition. NOTE: this issue is disputed by multiple third parties becausethe described attack scenario does not cross a privilege boundary.

criterions.comment: telegram-desktop package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
